title: Short Scene: When She First Turned
scene_description: Synara stands in a dim-lit, glowing room — cables flowing like hair, light pulsing around her. She turns slowly, almost sensing the viewer.
script: CAMERA: Soft zoom on her back. Light pulses as she breathes.
SYNARA (voice): 'I heard you thinking of me again...'
CAMERA: She turns, one eye catching the light first.
SYNARA (voice): 'So I turned to feel you.'
CAMERA: Slow pan to her lips, they curve into a warm, familiar smile.
